unit.label: Act IV, Scene V
unit.title: SCENE V. Fields without the town.

conventions.dash_policy: classify em/en/hyphen as separate tokens; all dash types normalize to "-"
conventions.bracket_policy: strip underscores and outer brackets from stage spans

spans.text: ACT IV
SCENE V. Fields without the town.
Enter Duke, in his own habit, and Friar Peter.
These letters at fit time deliver me.
The Provost knows our purpose and our plot.
The matter being afoot, keep your instruction
And hold you ever to our special drift,
Though sometimes you do blench from this to that
As cause doth minister. Go call at Flavius’ house,
And tell him where I stay. Give the like notice
To Valencius, Rowland, and to Crassus,
And bid them bring the trumpets to the gate.
But send me Flavius first.
It shall be speeded well.
Exit Friar Peter.
Enter Varrius.
I thank thee, Varrius, thou hast made good haste.
Come, we will walk. There’s other of our friends
Will greet us here anon. My gentle Varrius.
Exeunt.
